node.title: Court appearance over theft of 42,000 sought-after rapid antigen tests
node.alt: A woman police officer holds a man in a black tshirt
node.description: A fourth man arrested and charged late yesterday over the theft ofÂ 42,000 rapid antigen tests from a Sydney warehouse is to appear in court today.
node.content:
["A man will appear in court today over what NSW Premier Dominic Perrottet described as the\u00a0\"disgraceful\"\u00a0 theft of\u00a042,000 rapid antigen tests allegedly stolen from a Sydney warehouse.", "NSW Police said three\u00a0men were arrested during a raid on a Rosebery storage facility about 4pm on Wednesday afternoon, about 24 hours since the tests were taken from a Mascot depot.", "\"The men have been taken to Mascot Police Station, where they are assisting with inquiries,\" police said.", "\"Investigations into the theft are ongoing.\"", "The men were later released \"pending further inquiries\", police said.", "", "
The Rapid Antigen Test (RAT) kits found at Rosebery.
", "Earlier on Wednesday, Mr Perrottet condemned the alleged\u00a0robbery and promised the police would catch those responsible.", "Detectives searched two storage units at Rosebery\u00a0and seized a number of items, including the tests and KN95 face masks.", "", "
Detectives inspect\u00a0pallets found at the storage facility.(Supplied: NSW Police)
", "The tests had been taken from\u00a0a freight depot at\u00a0Hale Street in Botany\u00a0on Tuesday.", "Police arrested and charged a\u00a0fourth man, aged 27,\u00a0at Mascot Police Station late yesterday.", "He's been\u00a0charged with dishonestly obtaining property by deception, and has been\u00a0refused bail\u00a0to appear at Central Local Court today.", "Mr Perrottet said 150 million rapid antigen tests had been ordered for NSW.", "\"We see those tests playing a role in all our front-line work,\" he said.\u00a0", "", "
The masks were part of a haul found\u00a0at a storage facility at Rosebery yesterday.(Supplied: NSW Police\u00a0)
"]
